warning_text: Mattermost is accessible only using a dedicated host name (eg. mattermost.yourdomain.org). If you're using a Let's Encrypt certificate, remember to add the host name below to the "Domains" field inside the "Server certificate" page
valid_fqdn: Повинно містити принаймні дві точки, наприклад, як 'myhost.example.com'
